COMMON.ENTER_REGISTERED_EMAIL: Enter the email you registered with

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Password recovery
FORGOT_PASSWORD.INFO: In case you forgot your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.EXPECTATION: You will receive an email to this email address containing a code to reset your password. Do not try to reset your password if you haven't yet activated your user account. Activate your account first using the verification code we sent you via email.

RESEND_EMAIL.TITLE: Resend welcome email
RESEND_EMAIL.EXPECTATION: If you did not receive your welcome email or in case your verification code is out dated, type in your email to receive a new email containing a code you can use to verify your account.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Password reset
RESET_PASSWORD.INFO: Create a new password for your account.
RESET_PASSWORD.ENTER_CODE_YOU_RECEIVED: Enter code your received via email...
RESET_PASSWORD.CODE_SYNTAX: The code will look something like this: 856s2db3-049f-1ae7-bd5a-6ea9fe9dsbf6. Do not try to reset your password until you have activated your user account. You won't be able to log in until you have activated your account. Wait for the email containing your verification code.

REGISTER.TITLE: Register
REGISTER.PASSWORD_MISSING_ALPHA: Password is missing an alphanumeric character
REGISTER.PASSWORD_MISSING_DIGIT: Password is missing a numeric character
REGISTER.PASSWORD_MISSING_LOWERCASE: Password is missing a lowercase character
REGISTER.PASSWORD_MISSING_UPPERCASE: Password is missing an uppercase character
REGISTER.PASSWORD_MISSING_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password is missing a special character
REGISTER.PASSWORD_SYNTAX: The password you create with us must be at least 8 characters; contain a lower case and an uppercase character, a number and a symbol

VERIFY_EMAIL.TITLE: Verify your email
VERIFY_EMAIL.INFO: Enter the code we emailed you.
VERIFY_EMAIL.VERIFICATION_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter code your received via email...
